channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Parliament of Catalonia
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Parliament of Catalonia

item.title: Opinion Poll by NC Report for La Razón, 30 October–3 November 2017
item.description:
• Partit Demòcrata Europeu Català: 8.6–13.2%, 12–19 seats
  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya–Catalunya Sí: 23.2–29.7%, 36–46 seats
  • Ciutadans–Partido de la Ciudadanía: 16.8–22.7%, 23–31 seats
  • Partit dels Socialistes de Catalunya (PSC-PSOE): 11.3–16.4%, 14–22 seats
  • Catalunya en Comú: 8.4–12.9%, 9–16 seats
  • Partit Popular: 8.5–13.0%, 11–18 seats
  • Candidatura d’Unitat Popular: 4.8–8.4%, 5–10 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by GAD3 for La Vanguardia, 30 October–3 November 2017
item.description:
• Partit Demòcrata Europeu Català: 8.7–12.5%, 12–18 seats
  • Esquerra Republicana de Catalunya–Catalunya Sí: 26.6–32.2%, 40–50 seats
  • Ciutadans–Partido de la Ciudadanía: 18.2–23.2%, 25–32 seats
  • Partit dels Socialistes de Catalunya (PSC-PSOE): 12.6–16.9%, 16–23 seats
  • Catalunya en Comú: 6.8–10.2%, 7–12 seats
  • Partit Popular: 7.1–10.6%, 9–13 seats
  • Candidatura d’Unitat Popular: 5.0–8.0%, 5–10 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by SocioMétrica for El Español, 27–31 October 2017
item.description:

  • Partit Popular: 7.4–10.9%, 10–14 seats
  • Candidatura d’Unitat Popular: 4.4–7.3%, 4–9 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by GESOP for CEO, 16–29 October 2017
item.description:

  • Partit dels Socialistes de Catalunya (PSC-PSOE): 11.8–16.1%, 15–22 seats
  • Catalunya en Comú: 8.7–12.5%, 9–15 seats
  • Partit Popular: 6.7–10.1%, 8–13 seats
  • Candidatura d’Unitat Popular: 4.8–7.8%, 5–10 seats
